## Acknowledgements 

### The contents of the book 
* Most content comes from the "EPIET-World". One important basis is the introductory course of the ECDC Fellowship Programme and specifically the presentations that have been held there by numerous euroopean surveillance experts. * One important source are the publications by ECDC namely the Handbook on evaluating infectious disease surveillance
* The publications from CDC have been used especially
  - [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3820481/](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3820481/)

### Usage of images
- Only images that had a creative commons were used (except the pictures from Bing Image Creator). The authors of the work are written underneath each picture.
- The primary source of images is Mediawiki the image storing space of Wikipedia the greates project of the internet.

### Coding and publishing of the book
This book builds upon the wonderful software of [quarto](quarto.org), that itself uses many open source software projects. One important basis is R and Git. This book is published on github.  

### Usage of artificial intelligence
- ChatGPT has been used to polish the text and help with the wording. It has neither been used to generate content or to structure the book or a text. ChatGPT has also been used to code - especially the stages graph.
- Bing Image Creator has been used to create images
